title: 'Heartbreaking' but a 'relief' - how athletes reacted to Olympic delay
description: Olympians including Katarina Johnson-Thompson and Adam Peaty react to the Tokyo Games being postponed until 2021.
content:
Hockey player Susannah Townsend planned to retire after the Olympics this summer
For most, Tuesday’s news that the Tokyo 2020 Olympics have been postponed until 2021 was merely a formality. 
It seemed inevitable, given the global coronavirus pandemic which … [+3359 chars]
